    • About Bob Sokoler


    Bob Sokoler is the owner of The Sokoler Medley Team at RE/MAX Properties East in Louisville, Kentucky, which has ranked No. 1 in the city for sales volume Six years in a row! His team sold more than 404 homes in 2016 and more than 340 properties in 2015.

    Before becoming a realtor in 2004, Bob was a two-time Emmy Award-winning journalist, serving as the anchor and reporter for WHAS TV and the television show âLouisville Tonight Live.â Prior to that, he was also the anchor and a reporter for the 5:00pm News at WXIA-TV in Atlanta, Georgia; the weekend news anchor and a field reporter for the 5:30pm news at WCPX-TV in Orlando, Florida; and a news reporter at a number of other highly regarded stations â including WJZ-TV in Baltimore, KUTV-TV in Salt Lake City, and WYRT-TV in Flint, Michigan.
